definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
metronidazole, clotrimazole and chlorhexidine acetate (as suppository)

sentences.english: The growth curve was drawn by the method of methyl-thiazol-tetrazolium (MTT).
sentences.chinese: 四甲基偶氮唑盐法绘制生长曲线。

sentences.english: Oxacillin and cefazolin were added to control infection.
sentences.chinese: 术后还加用新型青霉素和头孢唑啉，控制感染。

sentences.english: Data from preclinical studies of zoledronic acid suggest its definite anti-tumor effect.
sentences.chinese: 多个临床前研究显示唑来膦酸具有明确的抗肿瘤作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of pantoprazole in the upper digestive tract profuse bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究泮托拉唑治疗上消化道大量出血的疗效。

sentences.english: And the effects of S-3307 on nitrogen metabolism was higher than carbohydrate metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 烯效唑对氮代谢的促进作用大于对糖代谢。

sentences.english: This compound was an important intermediate to synthesize carfentrazone-ethyl, one super highly effective herbicide.
sentences.chinese: 该化合物是合成超高效除草剂唑酮草酯的重要中间体。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the synthetic procedure of terazosin hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的改进盐酸特拉唑嗪的合成工艺。

sentences.english: The study was supported by Dainippon Sumitomo Pharma, which discovered zonisamide.
sentences.chinese: 该研究由发现唑尼沙胺的住友制药资助。

sentences.english: In this article, we reviewed the progress of zoledronic acid in treating cancer bone metastases.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了唑来膦酸治疗恶性肿瘤骨转移的研究进展。

sentences.english: The coupling of different azoles could generate the corresponding cross-coupling products.
sentences.chinese: 同时，不同唑类之间还能得到交叉偶联的产物。

sentences.english: The result of experiment provide scientific basis for industrial production for myclobutanil.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果为腈菌唑的工业生产提供了依据。

sentences.english: Objectives To compare the efficacy of zolpidem tartrate and stilnox in the treatment for insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较酒石酸唑吡坦和思诺思片治疗失眠的疗效。

sentences.english: Aripiprazole is in tablet and liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 阿立哌唑有片剂和口腔崩解片两种。

sentences.english: Androgens increase sebum production, which results in oily skin and acne.
sentences.chinese: 雄激素增加皮脂产生，导致油性皮肤和唑疮。

sentences.english: Therapy with phentolamine produced a significant decrease in the preejection period index.
sentences.chinese: 用酚胺唑啉治疗，能使喷射前期指数大大降低。

sentences.english: Azole derivatives, their use, production and usage.
sentences.chinese: 唑类衍生物，其用途，生产和使用。
